Exam is not valid. 0 out of 61 questions
As of 27-02-2023 none of the questions are valid. Went to the exam today, all 61 questions are changed.

questions.question_text: Which description of synchronous calls to an API is true?

choices.A: They can be used only within single-threaded processes.
choices.D: They can be used only for small requests.
choices.C: They always successfully return within a fixed time.
choices.B: They pause execution and wait for the response.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Drag and drop the code to complete the curl query to the Umbrella Reporting API that provides a detailed report of blocked security activity events from the organization with an organizationId of "12345678" for the last 24 hours. Not all options are used.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

When the URI "/api/fmc_config/v1/domain/e276abec-e0f2-11e3-8169-6d9ed49b625f/policy/accesspolicies" is used to make a POST request, what does
"e276abec-e0f2-11e3-8169-6d9ed49b625f" represent?

discussion.content:
This is correct: Get top million domains
https://developer.cisco.com/docs/cloud-security/#!investigate-request-samples/get-top-million-domains

Request:
curl -i GET "https://investigate.api.umbrella.com/topmillion?limit=1000" \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer %YourToken%' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json'
